Title: Dougal
Director: Dave Borthwick, Jean Duval, Frank Passingham
Writer: Serge Danot (characters), Raoff Sanoussi, Stephane Sanoussi, Tad Safran (additional material), Paul Bassett (screenplay), Martine Danot (characters)
Actors: Tom Baker, Jim Broadbent, Lee Evans, Joanna Lumley
Plot: A group of friends embark on a dangerous journey in an effort to imprison their oppressor, the evil wizard Zeebad.
